channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Charlie Kirk’s Horrific Murder Is a Tragedy — and a Warning
item.description: If we are to remain the place the Founders hoped we would be, then we cannot ever treat such events as acceptable or deserved.

item.title: ‘Lots of gasps and dropped jaws’: Stephen Colbert learned of Jimmy Kimmel’s suspension while taping his own canceled CBS show
item.description: President Trump called it “Great News for America: The ratings challenged Jimmy Kimmel Show is CANCELLED." (The show was suspended, not cancelled.)

item.title: A Visit to the University of Texas’s Art Museum in Austin
item.description: A nice place, but someone should explain what ‘extraction’ means to the wealth of the nation and people’s paychecks.

item.title: ‘Self-Care’ Spending Might Explain Why America Is So Deeply In Debt
item.description: However much we want to blame Congress for the nation’s budgetary woes, our lawmakers do little more than reflect the societal zeitgeist.

item.title: Trump says Jimmy Kimmel pulled off air due to 'lack of talent'
item.description: During a press conference in England President Donald Trump claimed that TV host Jimmy Kimmel had been "fired" because of his "lack of talent."

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from immediately deporting Guatemalan migrant children
item.description: A federal judge on Thursday blocked President Donald Trump's administration from immediately deporting Guatemalan migrant children who came to the U.S...

item.title: Trump repeats that Ukraine war is harder to end than he thought, says Putin let him down
item.description: President Trump on Thursday again acknowledged the war between Ukraine and Russia is harder to resolve than he thought, saying Russian President Vladi...

item.title: Trump praises U.K. trade deal, pledges to finalize it with 'tough' British negotiators
item.description: President Trump said Thursday he would finalize a trade deal with the U.K. "very soon" as he tries to lock in favorable trade terms for the U.S. despi...

item.title: The Tragedy of Lifespans in Politics
item.description: Charlie Kirk was denied the chance to grow and mature in political commentary.

item.title: Stop Sending Your Kids To Schools Where Teachers Celebrate Murder
item.description: A system that has granted such power to murder-loving ideologues cannot be redeemed; it must be destroyed and remade.

item.title: Hillary Clinton sparks social media firestorm for promoting book warning about 'fascists': 'Sick people'
item.description: Former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton is facing backlash from conservatives online for promoting a book that labels her political opponents "fasci...

item.title: FCC chief considers charging Kimmel, ABC with spreading misinformation over jokes, remarks about the ideology of Charlie Kirk assassin
item.description: “We’re reinvigorating the FCC’s enforcement of the public interest,” Brendan Carr said on CNBC, “and I think that’s a good thing.”

item.title: Disgruntled Starbucks workers in 3 states sue over dress-code changes, saying the company refused to reimburse them
item.description: “As part of this change, and to ensure out partners were prepared, partners received two shirts at no cost,” Starbucks said about its workers.

item.title: American History’s Stark Warning Against Tolerating Political Violence
item.description: In the runup to the Civil War, the beating of a U.S. senator nearly to death was celebrated across the South.

item.title: Trump, Starmer sign multibillion-dollar tech deal on AI, nuclear energy and other innovations
item.description: President Trump and British Prime Minister Keir Starmer signed a multibillion-dollar technology pact Thursday boosting cooperation in artificial intel...

item.title: Reactions pour in about ABC's suspension of Jimmy Kimmel's show
item.description: ABC's suspension of Jimmy Kimmel's show following comments he made about the killing of Charlie Kirk set off a flood of reactions, including from Pres...

item.title: SCOOP: Iryna Zarutska stabbing fuels transit safety overhaul talks in House
item.description: House lawmakers to meet with transit and police leaders after a deadly Charlotte stabbing raised alarms about safety on U.S. public transit.

item.title: $34 billion was wiped from Larry Ellison’s net worth days after briefly becoming the world’s richest as ‘AI bubble’ fears grow
item.description: Larry Ellison briefly knocked Tesla CEO Elon Musk from the top spot last week, but he’s lost billions in the one week since.

item.title: The Atlantic’s Originalist Sin
item.description: A historian misrepresents conservative jurisprudence and misunderstands the greatness of our founding document.

item.title: The 10 best countries to retire in right now—and America didn’t make the cut
item.description: As retiring in America becomes increasingly unaffordable, retirees are booking a one-way trip to Portugal instead.

item.title: UATX An Outlier Among Colleges In Expressing Opposition To Charlie Kirk’s Assassination
item.description: The dean of UATX wrote to students and faculty describing security measures in place and reaffirming UATX’s commitment to free speech.

item.title: WATCH: Coast Guard seizes cocaine, suspected narco-terrorists in Pacific Viper raid
item.description: The Coast Guard has seized more than 75,000 pounds of cocaine as part of its new Operation Pacific Viper, which the Trump administration unveiled in A...

item.title: Lawmaker who tied Kirk to ‘domestic terrorism’ facing expulsion calls amid politician blowback nationwide
item.description: Several mayors and lawmakers face backlash for controversial posts about Charlie Kirk's death, including a West Virginia delegate who called his words...

item.description: If Lafayette, William Penn, and Winston Churchill were subject to individualized examination before a grant of honorary citizenship, then certainly th...

item.title: Any TikTok Deal Must Separate It from China
item.description: The administration, having long flouted the law, now appears poised to evade it permanently.

item.title: Coaching Investors Beyond Risk Profiling: Overcoming Emotional Biases
item.description: Emotional biases can distort risk profiling. Advisors who coach investors through them help build resilience and better long-term outcomes. The post C...

item.title: From Inefficiency to Alpha: Europe’s Lower Mid-Market Opportunity
item.description: Private credit funds with ties to local European markets can look to underserved lower mid-market enterprises to generate alpha. The post From Ineffic...
